about_the_game:
Feed your cats with their favorite foods, then the miracle will happen!

Install the free DLC to unlock some adult contents :)

Thank you very much for supporting ”Miss Neko” series.
Please leave your comments to help us improve!

content_descriptors.notes:
- This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
- The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
Feed your cats with their favorite foods, then the miracle will happen!

Install the free DLC to unlock some adult contents :)

Thank you very much for supporting ”Miss Neko” series.

name: Miss Neko 3 - Free Bonus Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7/8/10 32/64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: GTX760
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Feed your cats with their favorite foods, then the miracle will happen!
supported_languages:
English, Russian, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
